channel.title: exec(foo) Blog
channel.description: A blog about creating software. Opinions are my own.

item.title: Hallo Welt
item.description: A new year, a new blog. To get back into the habit of writing regularly again after a pretty long hitiatus, I finally fixed my blog. Asâ€¦
item.content:encoded:
A new year, a new blog. To get back into the habit of writing regularly again after a pretty long hitiatus, I finally fixed my blog. As always, the content will be rather random, but somewhat about software, remote working and making cider.

Since I have been using React a bit recently, this blog is now powered by Gatsby.
